full_description: Use the robotic arms to move the red block {D} and green block {E} between three pads {A}, {B}, and {C} in a continuous cycle for two rounds.
schema: {A} notifies pad0, {B} notifies pad1, {C} notifies pad2, {D} notifies red block, {E} notifies green block, {a} notifies left arm, {b} notifies right arm
preference: No adjectives at the end. Max 15 words. Include {A} through {E} in all. Include {a} or {b} in exactly 50% of instructions.
seen: Use {a} and {b} to cycle {D} and {E} across {A}, {B}, {C} twice.
Cycle blocks {D} and {E} through pads {A}, {B}, and {C} two times.
Employ {a} or {b} to shift {D} and {E} between {A}, {B}, {C}.
Move {D} and {E} across {A}, {B}, {C} for two complete cycles.
Direct {a} and {b} to swap {D} and {E} on {A}, {B}, {C} twice.
Execute two rounds of cycling {D} and {E} over {A}, {B}, {C}.
Control {a} and {b} to transport {D} and {E} between {A}, {B}, {C}.
Perform the block cycle task with {D}, {E} using {A}, {B}, {C} twice.
Utilize {a} and {b} to relocate {D} and {E} among {A}, {B}, {C}.
Loop {D} and {E} through positions {A}, {B}, and {C} twice.
Use {a} and {b} to transfer {D} and {E} across {A}, {B}, {C}.
Rotate {D} and {E} between {A}, {B}, {C} for two full rounds.
Operate {a} and {b} to cycle {D} and {E} via {A}, {B}, {C}.
Shift {D} and {E} between pads {A}, {B}, {C} twice sequentially.
Command {a} and {b} to move {D} and {E} on {A}, {B}, {C}.
Finish two cycles of moving {D} and {E} between {A}, {B}, {C}.
Let {a} and {b} cycle {D} and {E} across {A}, {B}, {C} twice.
Complete the movement of {D} and {E} over {A}, {B}, {C} twice.
Task {a} and {b} to cycle {D} and {E} using {A}, {B}, {C}.
Relocate {D} and {E} between {A}, {B}, and {C} for two loops.
unseen: Cycle {D} and {E} through {A}, {B}, and {C} twice using both arms.
Move {D} and {E} between {A}, {B}, {C} for two full rotations.
Use {a} and {b} to complete two block cycles on {A}, {B}, {C}.
Perform two rounds of swapping {D} and {E} across {A}, {B}, {C}.
